relationships.description: Harry is told to go to Gregory's corridor at 5 o'clock tomorrow.
Harry plans to break into Umbridge's office and use her fire to speak to Sirius.
Today is the first time Harry will be in close proximity with Snape since Snape's return to Hogwarts.
